text: Hey! Do you have any tips how to convert text module to global module in custom coded page templates?

I believe you would need a drag&drop template.
Tho you can just generate a new one temporary for the operation (at least as far as I know, they didn't updated the process):
- New DnD template
- Add the CM to the template
- Select the module (click on the module)
- In the right sidebar click in "More", then "Convert to global module"
